content.text: is designed to provide a summarized view of meter billing data. It aggregates data from another view,

, to present a summary of transactions, net therms, net CCF (hundred cubic feet), and other billing-related metrics. The view categorizes billing data into three types: "Original Meter Billing," "Adjustment Meter Billing," and "Total Meter Billing," based on whether the billing period matches the revision period. This categorization is achieved using a
operation to combine detailed and total summaries.
